CmdLine: add-apt-repository -y ppa:openjdk-r/ppa &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y openjdk-8-jdk openjdk-8-jre-headless &&     apt-get clean &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir /bazel &&     cd /bazel &&     curl -fSsL -O https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/download/$BAZEL_VERSION/bazel-$BAZEL_VERSION-installer-linux-x86_64.sh &&     curl -fSsL -o /bazel/LICENSE.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bazelbuild/bazel/master/LICENSE.txt &&     chmod +x bazel-*.sh &&     ./bazel-$BAZEL_VERSION-installer-linux-x86_64.sh &&     cd / &&     rm -f /bazel/bazel-$BAZEL_VERSION-installer-linux-x86_64.sh
Commands.Name: run
